00019     RootPrimaryGenerator::RootPrimaryGenerator(G4String filename) {
00020 
00021         filename_ = filename;
00022         ifile_ = new TFile(filename_);
00023         itree_ = (TTree*) ifile_->Get(EventConstants::EVENT_TREE_NAME.c_str());
00024         eventHeader_ = 0;
00025         simParticles_ = new TClonesArray(EventConstants::SIM_PARTICLE.c_str());
00026         itree_->SetBranchAddress(EventConstants::EVENT_HEADER.c_str(), &eventHeader_);
00027         itree_->SetBranchAddress("SimParticles_sim", &simParticles_);
00028         evtCtr_ = 0;
00029         nEvts_ = itree_->GetEntriesFast();
00030     }
00031 
00032     RootPrimaryGenerator::~RootPrimaryGenerator() {
00033     }
00034 
00035     void RootPrimaryGenerator::GeneratePrimaryVertex(G4Event* anEvent) {
00036 
00037         std::cout << "Reading next Root event ..." << std::endl;
00038         if (evtCtr_ > nEvts_)
00039             G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00040 
00041         itree_->GetEntry(evtCtr_);
00042 
00043         // put in protection for if we run out of ROOT events
00044         std::vector<G4PrimaryVertex*> vertices;
00045         for (int iSP = 0; iSP < simParticles_->GetEntriesFast(); ++iSP) {
00046 
00047             // check if particle has status 1
00048             ldmx::SimParticle* sp = (ldmx::SimParticle*) simParticles_->At(iSP);
00049             if (sp->getGenStatus() != 1)
00050                 continue;
00051 
00052             bool vertexExists = false;
00053             G4PrimaryVertex* curvertex = new G4PrimaryVertex();
00054             for (unsigned int iV = 0; iV < vertices.size(); ++iV) {
00055                 double cur_vx = sp->getVertex()[0];
00056                 double cur_vy = sp->getVertex()[1];
00057                 double cur_vz = sp->getVertex()[2];
00058                 double i_vx = vertices.at(iV)->GetX0();
00059                 double i_vy = vertices.at(iV)->GetY0();
00060                 double i_vz = vertices.at(iV)->GetZ0();
00061                 if ((cur_vx == i_vx) && (cur_vy == i_vy) && (cur_vz == i_vz)) {
00062                     vertexExists = true;
00063                     curvertex = vertices.at(iV);
00064                 }
00065             }
00066             if (vertexExists == false) {
00067                 curvertex->SetPosition(sp->getVertex()[0], sp->getVertex()[1], sp->getVertex()[2]);
00068                 curvertex->SetWeight(1.);
00069                 anEvent->AddPrimaryVertex(curvertex);
00070             }
00071 
00072             G4PrimaryParticle* primary = new G4PrimaryParticle();
00073             primary->SetPDGcode(sp->getPdgID());
00074             primary->SetMomentum(sp->getMomentum()[0] * MeV, sp->getMomentum()[1] * MeV, sp->getMomentum()[2] * MeV);
00075             primary->SetMass(sp->getMass() * MeV);
00076 
00077             UserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = new UserPrimaryParticleInformation();
00078             primaryInfo->setHepEvtStatus(1.);
00079             primary->SetUserInformation(primaryInfo);
00080 
00081             curvertex->SetPrimary(primary);
00082 
00083         }
00084 
00085         std::ofstream tmpout("tmpEvent.rndm");
00086         std::string eventSeed = eventHeader_->getStringParameter("eventSeed");
00087         tmpout << eventSeed;
00088         tmpout.close();
00089 
00090         // ..... validation ..... 
00091         // int nPV = anEvent->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex();
00092         // for (int iPV = 0; iPV < nPV; ++iPV){
00093         //     G4PrimaryVertex* curPV =  anEvent->GetPrimaryVertex(iPV);
00094         //     int nPar = curPV->GetNumberOfParticle();            
00095         //     for (int iPar = 0; iPar < nPar; ++iPar){
00096         //         std::cout << "pv/primary = " << iPV << "," << iPar << std::endl;
00097         //     }
00098         // }
00099 
00100         // move to the next event
00101         evtCtr_++;
00102 
00103     }
00104 
00105 }
